channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Thailand Celebrates Songkran
item.description: The worldâ€™s biggest water fight has kicked off as Thailand celebrates its new year, attracting thousands of participants.

item.title: Iran Launches Direct Attack on Israel With Hundreds of Drones and Missiles
item.description: Iran has launched its first ever direct attack on Israel in the form of hundreds of drones and missiles, the large majority of which were intercepted by Israeli and U.S. forces.

item.title: New Incubator in Rural Taiwan Attracts Young Tech Talent
item.description: Young entrepreneurs are finding a home for their startups at a new incubator in a rural part of Taiwan. Tiffany Wong reports from Chiayi County.

item.title: Complaints Rise as Taiwan's Child Protection Law Hits One-Year Mark
item.description: Taiwan's child care professionals have seen a sharp increase in formal complaints made against them since new child protection laws came into force one year ago.
